attributes.action: Reduce the cost of international arrivals Quarantine/Testing as it too expensive
attributes.additional_details: The costs are way too high and beyond the actual cost of the hotel rooms / coronavirus test kits .this will lead to diminishing mental health and stress among people returning to the UK.please reduce the costs or abolish the quarantine scheme.Instead,make it compulsory for arriving people to take a test on arrival and quarantine them only if they are found positive
attributes.background: Please reduce the cost for international arrivals quarantine/ testing as it is way too high for most people and a majority of the people who had left the country during lockdown left because they couldn’t afford the rent.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575118

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
